Label: Wind Magnetic Fields Investigation, High-resolution Definitive Data - A. Szabo (NASA/GSFC)

VariableDescription.Name: BF1
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Heliospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     WIND>Wind Interplanetary Plasma Laboratory
#     SOFTWARE_VERSION                V05.00
#     DATA_TYPE                       H2>High-resolution Definitive Data
#     DESCRIPTOR                      MFI>Magnetic Fields Investigation
#     DATA_VERSION                    04
#     TITLE                           WIND Magnetic Field Investigation (MFI) High-Resolution Production
#     TEXT                            WIND MFI high-resolution data file. Time resolution varies with instrument mode.
#                                     Modes 0 & 10, low rate: .184s, high rate: .092s
#                                     Modes 1 & 11, low rate: Prim .092s Sec 1.84s, high rate: Prim .046s Sec .92s
#                                     Modes 2 & 12, Same as Modes 1 & 11
#                                     Calibration constants are 1 minute averages.
#                                     WIND MFI Instrument turn on 11/12/1994
#                                     Data versions:
#                                     03 - Extrapolated Bz correction
#                                     04 - Final Bz correction
#                                     05 - Final attitude and Bz correction
#                                     References:
#                                     1. Lepping, R. P., et al., The WIND Magnetic Field Investigation, p. 207 in
#                                     The Global Geospace Mission, ed. by C. T. Russell, Kluwer,1995
#                                     2. Panetta, P. (GSFC), GGS WIND MFI Operator's Manual, September 15, 1992.
#                                     3. Computer Sciences Corporation, Data Format Control Document (DFCD) Between
#                                     The International Solar-Terrestrial Physics (ISTP) Program Information
#                                     Processing Division Ground Data Processing System and The ISTP Mission
#                                     Investigators, CSC/TR-91/6014, 560-1DFD/0190, July 1992.
#                                     4. Behannon, K. W., International Solar Terrestrial Physics (ISTP) Program
#                                     Investigator Data Analysis Requirements For WIND and GEOTAIL Spacecraft
#                                     Magnetometer Experiment, September 1987.
#                                     5. National Space Science Data Center, CDF User's Guide, Version 2.3.0,
#                                     October 1, 1992.
#                                     6. Mish, W. H., International Solar-Terrestrial Physics (ISTP) Key Parameter
#                                     Generation Software (KPGS) Standards & Conventions, September 1992.
#                                     7. Mish, W. H., IMP F and G Phase I Magnetic Field Analysis, April 1972
#     MODS                            10/01/2011 Initial release
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0141
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 wi_h2_mfi_00000000_v00
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  wi_h2_mfi
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Wind Magnetic Fields Investigation, High-resolution Definitive Data
#     PROCESSING_DATE                 Thu Feb  9 00:09:32 2012 UTC
#     LEVEL_0_FILE                    wi_lz_mfi_20111231_v01.dat
#                                     wi_lz_mfi_20120101_v01.dat
#                                     wi_lz_mfi_20120102_v01.dat
#     HKLVL_0_FILE                    wi_lz_scr_20111231_v01.dat
#                                     wi_lz_scr_20120101_v01.dat
#                                     wi_lz_scr_20120102_v01.dat
#     ORBIT_FILE                      wi_or_pre_20111231_v04.cdf
#                                     wi_or_pre_20120101_v04.cdf
#                                     wi_or_pre_20120102_v04.cdf
#     ATTITUDE_FILE                   wi_at_pre_20111231_v04.cdf
#                                     wi_at_pre_20120101_v04.cdf
#                                     wi_at_pre_20120102_v04.cdf
#     DEF_FLAGS                       00 - Interpolated   Calibration Values
#                                     01 - Last available Calibration Values
#                                     02 - Daily Computed Calibration Values
#                                     03 - Daily Computed Calibration Values with Bz corrections
#                                     04 - High-Resolution Calibration Values
#                                     05 - High-Resolution Calibration Values with Bz corrections
#     DEF_SPC_MODE                    01 - Science     mode (92 sec)
#                                     03 - Maneuver    mode (92 sec)
#                                     04 - Contingency mode (92 sec)
#                                     05 - Science     mode (46 sec)
#                                     07 - Maneuver    mode (46 sec)
#                                     08 - Contingency mode (46 sec)
#     DEF_MAG_MODE                    00 - Primary to Secondary Ratio  (1:1) Outboard prime w/ FFT & Snapshot
#                                     01 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (20:1) Outboard prime w/ FFT & Snapshot
#                                     02 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (20:1) Outboard prime w/ Snapshot only
#                                     03 - Primary to Secondary Ratio  (1:1) Outboard prime Maneuver
#                                     07 - Primary to Secondary Ratio  (1:1) Outboard prime used Inboard data
#                                     10 - Primary to Secondary Ratio  (1:1)  Inboard prime w/ FFT & Snapshot
#                                     11 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (20:1)  Inboard prime w/ FFT & Snapshot
#                                     12 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (20:1)  Inboard prime w/ Snapshot only
#                                     13 - Primary to Secondary Ratio  (1:1)  Inboard prime Maneuver
#     PI_NAME                         A. Szabo
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  NASA/GSFC
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Wind
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     WEB_SITES                       http://wind.nasa.gov
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, Centered, Number of milliseconds since the epoch
#  2. Magnetic field magnitude
#       NOTES:  B field Magnitude
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 21:46:32 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  B field Magnitude
#
EPOCH                               B
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms             nT
13-11-1994 15:50:26.328       4.87791
